Based on the examples, this feature represents:

**Negative/opposing prefix tokens (anti-, non-, semi-)**

The feature activates strongly on prefixes that indicate negation, opposition, or partial states - primarily "anti-" (against/opposed to), "non-" (not/absence of), and "semi-" (partially/half). These are all morphological prefixes that modify the meaning of root words in a limiting or qualifying way.
